channel.title: Galleries on Nikolai Nekrutenko
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on Nikolai Nekrutenko

item.title: Water Lilies & Dragonflies
item.description: Today, I headed down to The Arboretum at Penn State to see what flowers and insects were in store for me. At first, I decided to bring a 35mm macro lens. However, after seeing all of the dragonflies and lilies I biked home in record time and snagged a telephoto lens. I present to you the Water lilies and Dragonflies at The Arboretum at Penn State.

item.title: Solstice Fun
item.description: I went camping with my family in the beautiful Northern PA countryside, near the finger lakes. To celebrate the longest day of the year, I found a stick about my height and lit both ends of it on fire. It was similar to the staff that I use in Tang Soo Do, so I messed around with various techniques. Particularly, I really enjoy doing the figure-eight technique where you essentially spin the stick in the shape of an infinity sign.
